response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value, worth $800,000 to you, and we are excited to offer it to you today. We understand the importance of making this decision and would like to propose a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a highly competitive rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer. We look forward to serving you and ensuring your satisfaction with our product.", "product_price": 750000}
